categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Rint was a female Human who worked as an armsmaster in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, she set up shop in Coronet Spaceport in the Incorporation Islands region of the planet Corellia.
Armsmaster Rint appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Modification Commendations Vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
